message: #12929 Are all Sloan students mentally handicapted or it’s just the MBAs and Sloan Friends or Fellows or whatever. I tried taking a course 15 class but just couldn’t bare more of their “questions”.

#12926 I am hooked on weed and my whole self esteem depends on it. I need to stop but I know that if I stop reality will hit me in the face since I will reinterpret all my creations (art and experiments) as exaggerated ego pumps that I have been using to justify not conforming to social norms or doing actual work.
